abstract: Sometimes a grumpy old man is just what a community needs.
description: Richard Bailey has nudged and niggled people and he's had some success, especially on the asbestos issue. A heart attack in 2003 meant that Bailey couldn't be as active anymore, so he decided to direct his energies elsewhere.
